job_details.Functieomschrijving:
To support and create Support our existing cloud platforms and deploy new ones. We value a proactive attitude with great curiosity to explore new potential solutions. You will Guide, design and deploy cloud solutions for internal and external use Identify and drive improvement initiatives such as developing new tools, new applications, more efficient solutions, develop dashboards and other creative visualizations. Support existing and develop new Shiny-based or PowerBI interactive tools for internal and external use Critique our existing modelling workflows and implement standard ML pipelines in R To innovate and guide Lead and support our team as well as industry teams by creating new solutions that create value for our clients. Improve existing and develop new ML applications, including the use of DL models Explore the business potential of novel models and methods, including but not limited to LLMs and other transformer-based models Support on live client projects with data analysis
   and insight delivery
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer

To support and create Support our existing cloud platforms and deploy new ones. We value a proactive attitude with great curiosity to explore new potential solutions. You will Guide, design and deploy cloud solutions for internal and external use Identify and drive improvement initiatives such as developing new tools, new applications, more efficient solutions, develop dashboards and other creative visualizations. Support existing and develop new Shiny-based or PowerBI interactive tools for internal and external use Critique our existing modelling workflows and implement standard ML pipelines in R To innovate and guide Lead and support our team as well as industry teams by creating new solutions that create value for our clients. Improve existing and develop new ML applications, including the use of DL models Explore the business potential of novel models and methods, including but not limited to LLMs and other transformer-based models Support on live client projects with data analysis
   and insight delivery

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and deploying cloud solutions, improving existing modeling workflows, implementing standard ML pipelines in R, developing new ML applications including DL models, and exploring the business potential of novel models like LLMs. While LLMs are mentioned, the core focus remains on traditional ML engineering tasks, data analysis, and MLOps, aligning more closely with the 'ML Engineer' profile than a dedicated 'GenAI Engineer'.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Support our existing cloud platforms and deploy new ones' and 'develop dashboards and other creative visualizations' implies managing and building data infrastructure and presentation layers.
job_tasks.phrase: Support our existing cloud platforms and deploy new ones

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'develop dashboards and other creative visualizations' directly relates to presenting data, often requiring data preparation and pipeline work.
job_tasks.phrase: develop dashboards and other creative visualizations

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Critique our existing modelling workflows and implement standard ML pipelines in R' directly refers to the creation and refinement of machine learning models and processes.
job_tasks.phrase: Critique our existing modelling workflows and implement standard ML pipelines in R

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Improve existing and develop new ML applications, including the use of DL models' explicitly mentions the development and improvement of machine learning models, including deep learning.
job_tasks.phrase: Improve existing and develop new ML applications, including the use of DL models

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Explore the business potential of novel models and methods, including but not limited to LLMs and other transformer-based models' indicates research and application of advanced modeling techniques.
job_tasks.phrase: Explore the business potential of novel models and methods, including but not limited to LLMs and other transformer-based models

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Guide, design and deploy cloud solutions for internal and external use' implies building and deploying software systems, which is a core part of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Guide, design and deploy cloud solutions for internal and external use

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'developing new tools, new applications' directly relates to the creation of software applications.
The phrase 'develop dashboards and other creative visualizations' can also involve software development to create interactive tools.
job_tasks.phrase: develop dashboards and other creative visualizations

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'develop new Shiny-based or PowerBI interactive tools' points to the development of specific software applications for data visualization and interaction.
job_tasks.phrase: develop new Shiny-based or PowerBI interactive tools

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Support our existing cloud platforms and deploy new ones' and 'deploy cloud solutions' indicates involvement in the deployment and maintenance of systems in a production environment.
job_tasks.phrase: Support our existing cloud platforms and deploy new ones

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'implement standard ML pipelines in R' suggests setting up and managing production-ready ML workflows.
job_tasks.phrase: implement standard ML pipelines in R

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Explore the business potential of novel models and methods' indicates an understanding of how technical solutions can create business value.
job_tasks.phrase: Explore the business potential of novel models and methods

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'creating new solutions that create value for our clients' directly links technical work to business outcomes and client needs.
job_tasks.phrase: creating new solutions that create value for our clients

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Support on live client projects with data analysis and insight delivery' shows a focus on delivering business insights to clients.
job_tasks.phrase: Support on live client projects with data analysis and insight delivery
